channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub data type models Virtual Server type Storage storage offerings. Local accountId The internal identifier of the SoftLayer customer account that a Storage account belongs to. Type: integer capacityGb A Storage account's capacity, measured in gigabytes. Type: integer createDate The date a network storage volume was created. Type: dateTime guestId The unique identification number of the guest associated with a Storage volume.
